vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the Moabites living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ki.12.21;
father of: Jehozabad (H3075); also called Shimrith at 2Ch.24.26;
Also named: shim.rit (שִׁמְרִית "Shimrith" H8116)
§ Shomer = "keeper"
1) son of Jehozabad or Shimrith the Moabitess and one of the conspirators who slew king Joash of Judah
2) an Asherite, son of Heber
2a) also 'Shemer'
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a) שִׁמְרִית   madre de Jozabad, funcionario, en tiempos de Joás; (b)   hijo de Héber; tribu de Aser
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
朔默 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "持守者"
1) 摩押婦人示米利的丈夫, 約薩拔的父親, 約薩拔是背叛並謀殺猶大王
約阿施的人之一 (王下 12:21;代下 24:26)
2) 一位亞設家的人, 希別的兒子 (代上 7:32)
2a) 亦作 '撒瑪' [8106]
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
朔默 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "持守者"
1) 摩押妇人示米利的丈夫, 约萨拔的父亲, 约萨拔是背叛并谋杀犹大王
约阿施的人之一 (王下 12:21;代下 24:26)
2) 一位亚设家的人, 希别的儿子 (代上 7:32)
2a) 亦作 '撒玛' [8106]

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Asher living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.32;
son of: Heber (H2268);
brother of: Japhlet (H3310), Hotham (H2369) and Shua (H7774);
father of: Ahi (H0277H), Rohgah (H7303), Jehubbah (H3160) and Aram (H0758J); also called Shemer (KJV: Shamer) at 1Ch.7.34;
Also named: she.mer (שֶׁ֫מֶר "Shemer" H8106H)
§ Shomer = "keeper"
1) son of Jehozabad or Shimrith the Moabitess and one of the conspirators who slew king Joash of Judah
2) an Asherite, son of Heber
2a) also 'Shemer'
